thread.title: The Evolution of Trap Music in Atlanta
thread.title_full: The Evolution of Trap Music in Atlanta

author: VICE Staff
title: The Evolution of Trap Music in Atlanta
text:
The Evolution of Trap Music in Atlanta On a new episode of 'NOISEY,' we meet up with Migos, Lil Yachty, 21 Savage, Killer Mike, and more. 
On an all new episode of NOISEY , we return to Atlanta to hang out with Migos for the first time since they were arrested during a Georgia Southern University show and the prosecution played a previous Noisey documentary on the group in court. Ever since, the group has been very careful about how they're represented in the media, especially with Noisey. We talk with them about what happened and meet up with Killer Mike, Lil Yachty, 21 Savage, and more to talk about the evolution of Trap music, from drug houses to the Top 40.NOISEY airs Tuesdays at 10 PM on VICELAND. Want to know if you get VICELAND? Head here to find out how to tune in.
